meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>simplify a fraction of fractions</term>. If you have a fraction of fractions like <inline-math/> then you will be able to <skill-link>turn this into a single fraction</skill-link> like <inline-math/> and subsequently <skill-link>simplify this fraction</skill-link> into <inline-math/>. The result is always a fraction that cannot be simplified further.</par>
